title: There's No Crime Like the Present
description: Emily and Otto have a dispute about gift-giving - when is it required? Otto works long shifts in a remote location and says it's difficult to find time to buy traditional presents. Emily still wants him to recognize holidays and birthdays. Can the Judge resolve their problem at present?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
